name: GIGABYTE G6X Series (Intel Core i7-13650HX, 16GB RAM, 1TB SSD, RTX 4060, 16'' 165Hz IPS)
graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Laptop GPU + 8GB GDDR6 VRAM
description_para: Elevate your gaming and work experience with the GIGABYTE G6X Series. Featuring an Intel Core i7-13650HX processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 GPU, it delivers powerful performance and smooth graphics. With 16GB DDR5 RAM and a 1TB PCIe SSD, you'll enjoy fast speeds and ample storage. The 16.0-inch WUXGA 165Hz display provides stunning visuals, while the robust design in Gunmetal Gray and comprehensive connectivity options keep you prepared for any challenge. Windows 11 Home ensures a modern, efficient operating environment. Brand new and performance-ready, this laptop is an excellent choice for high-demand tasks.
description_points: Powerful Performance: Equipped with an Intel Core i7-13650HX processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 GPU, the G6X Series delivers exceptional gaming and productivity performance with smooth, high-quality graphics. Fast and Spacious: With 16GB DDR5 RAM and a 1TB PCIe SSD, enjoy rapid data access and ample storage for all your games, applications, and files. Vivid Display: The 16.0-inch WUXGA (1920x1200) 165Hz IPS display offers stunning visuals and fluid motion, perfect for immersive gaming and multimedia experiences. Comprehensive Connectivity: Featuring the latest Wi-Fi 6E, Bluetooth 5.2, and multiple ports including USB-C and HDMI 2.1, the G6X Series ensures versatile connectivity and fast data transfer. Sleek and Durable Design: The Gunmetal Gray chassis combines style with durability, while the laptopâ€™s dimensions and weight make it portable enough for on-the-go use.
